p.style: -qt-paragraph-type:empty; margin-top:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:0px; -qt-block-indent:0; text-indent:0px; font-size:14pt; color:#00aa00;

p.span: The program includes three models of the collisions. It is important to note that only the Merge model is stable and works correctly, while the others are experimental and should not be used for research.
